meanings.definition: conquerers (noun): those who conquer or defeat others in battle or competition
meanings.sent1: The conquerers celebrated their victory with a grand feast.
meanings.sent2: The conquerers marched triumphantly through the city after their win.
meanings.sent3: The conquerers were so proud of their success that they couldn't stop smiling.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, the conquerers are the ones who always come out on top.
meanings.sent5: The conquerers' determination and skill led them to conquer all their opponents.

meanings.definition: conquerers (verb): to defeat or overcome in battle or competition
meanings.sent1: The army planned their strategy to conquerers the enemy forces.
meanings.sent2: She conquerers her fear of public speaking by practicing regularly.
meanings.sent3: The team worked together to conquerers the challenging obstacle course.
meanings.sent4: With hard work and dedication, they were able to conquerers all the difficulties they faced.
meanings.sent5: He set out to conquerers the mountain, determined to reach the summit.
